inazuma.name: Inazuma
inazuma.description: But an instant there is, for cards to be played. Play swiftly enough, and even transience itself shall fall before you.
inazuma.descriptionraw: But an instant there is, for cards to be played. Play swiftly enough, and even transience itself shall fall before you.

origin.name: Origin
origin.description:
Betwixt day and night, between heaven and earth,
That is where hopes and dreams sojourn.
origin.descriptionraw: Betwixt day and night, between heaven and earth,\nThat is where hopes and dreams sojourn.

mistflowercorolla.name: Mist Flower Corolla
mistflowercorolla.description: "To concede gracefully is your inevitable end."
mistflowercorolla.descriptionraw: "To concede gracefully is your inevitable end."

cecilia.name: Cecilia
cecilia.description: Are those who have the breeze and the dew for company the only ones who may enjoy the dawn's first light?
cecilia.descriptionraw: Are those who have the breeze and the dew for company the only ones who may enjoy the dawn's first light?

crystalchunk.name: Crystal Chunk
crystalchunk.description: If well-honed, suitable material can truly show its quality.
crystalchunk.descriptionraw: If well-honed, suitable material can truly show its quality.

adept.name: Adept
adept.description: There is no conundrum you cannot solve, nothing beyond your power to do. We salute you!
adept.descriptionraw: There is no conundrum you cannot solve, nothing beyond your power to do. We salute you!
adept.source: Reward for completing all objectives in the 4th match of the TCG Player's Manual

amethystlump.name: Amethyst Lump
amethystlump.description: Adapting to where you are is also a form of wisdom.
amethystlump.descriptionraw: Adapting to where you are is also a form of wisdom.

sumeru.name: Sumeru
sumeru.description:
To think one or two steps ahead is amateur work. Truly expert players can even see fifty or a hundred steps ahead.
And it would be a simple matter, would it not?
sumeru.descriptionraw: To think one or two steps ahead is amateur work. Truly expert players can even see fifty or a hundred steps ahead.\nAnd it would be a simple matter, would it not?

dendrobium.name: Dendrobium
dendrobium.description: If only all battles could be fought on the tabletop...
dendrobium.descriptionraw: If only all battles could be fought on the tabletop...

liyue.name: Liyue
liyue.description: Every journey must start with a first step. Build your deck with a steady hand, and steady shall the road to victory be.
liyue.descriptionraw: Every journey must start with a first step. Build your deck with a steady hand, and steady shall the road to victory be.

lazuriteswirl.name: Lazurite Swirl
lazuriteswirl.description:
A special card back customized by the renowned artist Calx.
"Like the Dragon of the East, stretch your wings more freely on this battlefield of cards!"
lazuriteswirl.descriptionraw: A special card back customized by the renowned artist Calx.\n"Like the Dragon of the East, stretch your wings more freely on this battlefield of cards!"

glazelily.name: Glaze Lily
glazelily.description: The ancient tales of mortal realms have passed away. Now, only the fragrant name of the flowers remains.
glazelily.descriptionraw: The ancient tales of mortal realms have passed away. Now, only the fragrant name of the flowers remains.

electrocrystal.name: Electro Crystal
electrocrystal.description: Will aggressive methods be of any use? This is not the only thing balanced on a hair trigger!
electrocrystal.descriptionraw: Will aggressive methods be of any use? This is not the only thing balanced on a hair trigger!

treasuresofthedeck.name: Treasures of the Deck
treasuresofthedeck.description: Treasures are gained and used only for the moment, and their contents are never quite the same. What treasures lie within your cards this time?
treasuresofthedeck.descriptionraw: Treasures are gained and used only for the moment, and their contents are never quite the same. What treasures lie within your cards this time?

mondstadt.name: Mondstadt
mondstadt.description:
Freedom is the first principle of cards.
Freely you organize your deck, freely you choose your opponents, and freely you play your hand.
...Or perhaps you might use that freedom to not play at all, and do something else with the cards you have in hand.
mondstadt.descriptionraw: Freedom is the first principle of cards.\nFreely you organize your deck, freely you choose your opponents, and freely you play your hand.\n...Or perhaps you might use that freedom to not play at all, and do something else with the cards you have in hand.

legend.name: Legend
legend.description: You have come far indeed to become a Legend, but the road ahead is still long.
legend.descriptionraw: You have come far indeed to become a Legend, but the road ahead is still long.

dandelionseed.name: Dandelion Seed
dandelionseed.description: Hope and patience are close companions.
dandelionseed.descriptionraw: Hope and patience are close companions.
